summary: The team has set a final QA timeline for a June 3 rollout. Anjali is tasked with completing the user manual draft, while the development team investigates a login bug. Initial planning has also begun for an early access user engagement campaign.
decisions: Final round of quality assurance testing is locked for June 3 rollout.
Initial planning has started for the early access user engagement campaign.

actionItems.task: Analyze root cause of recent authentication failures.
